title: Free rotation causing client to crash.
body: So... is this a bug or is there a viable reason why my client is crashing every time I run it? (Every champ is showing up for free rotation. Thusfore crashing my game)

replies.body:
That's pretty strange.. I've never heard of this issue before. It's possible that League's assets are corrupt and causing this to happen, so I recommend [running a repair of your League files.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq5)

Let me know if this resolved the issue for you.
The champion rotation is a visual bug, and wouldn't affect your patcher to crash.  Are you receiving any error messages?  When does it happen exactly, like when you press Launch?  Let me know!

The free rotation is fixed now. But what was happening is I think I crashed because it couldn't display all of the champions on the patcher because of my screen resolution. It happened as soon as the champion rotation showed up on the screen. The client just froze.
